title: UGC warns against bribery ahead of recruitment
body: The University Grants Commission of Bangladesh on Thursday issued a warning to job seekers and their families to avoid financial transactions or unethical dealings related to next recruitment examinations. The tests for various 9th-grade posts at the UGC will be held in Dhaka on December 5, 6 and 19, said a press release. The commission said appointments will be made strictly on merit and qualifications, leaving no scope for securing jobs through payment or influence. The commission also clarified it will not bear responsibility for fraudulent activities carried out in its name. Candidates have been urged to report any information related to bribery or corruption to law enforcement agencies or directly to the UGC.
